solution_line_template: Helen won twice as many games as Betsy's {betsy_wins} so Helen won {helen_multiplier}*{betsy_wins} = <<{helen_wins}={helen_wins}>>{helen_wins} games
Susan won three times as many games as Betsy's {betsy_wins} so Susan won {susan_multiplier}*{betsy_wins} = <<{susan_multiplier}*{betsy_wins}={susan_wins}>>{susan_wins} games
When you combine their wins, together they won {betsy_wins}+{helen_wins}+{susan_wins} = <<{betsy_wins}+{helen_wins}+{susan_wins}={total_wins}>>{total_wins} games total
